original_text:
And Elihu the son of Barachel the Buzite answered and said:
“I am young in years,
    and you are aged;
therefore I was timid and afraid
    to declare my opinion to you.
korean_text: 부스 사람 바라겔의 아들 엘리후가 대답하여 이르되 나는 연소하고 당신들은 연로하므로 뒷전에서 나의 의견을 감히 내놓지 못하였노라

sentences.original_text: And Elihu the son of Barachel the Buzite
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 부스 사람 바라겔의 아들 엘리후는

sentences.original_text: therefore I was timid and afraid
to declare my opinion to you.
